arts.ttl: ‘Excellent’ – Leeds United man hailed by Daniel Farke after Watford win
arts.sum: Leeds United boss Daniel Farke has hailed Ao Tanaka for his ‘excellent’ performances. Leeds United won 4-0 away… The post ‘Excellent’ – Leeds United man hailed by Daniel Farke after Watford win appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Leeds wingers and Piroe milestone vs Watford sends promotion message to rivals
arts.sum: Daniel James took his goal tally to 10 for the season with his brace before fellow winger Manor Solomon made it 3-0 before half-time. Piroe netted for the first time in three league games this season and is looking close to his clinical self again.

arts.ttl: Championship roundup: Leeds rout Watford as Farke hails ‘poetry in motion’
arts.sum: Leads win 4-0 away to surge five points clear at top Preston and Coventry boost playoff hopes Daniel Farke hailed Leeds’ “top level” forwards after the emphatic 4-0 win at Watford increased their lead at the Championship summit to five points. Dan James opened the scoring in the 20th minute after latching on to a misplaced pass from Edo Kayembe. The Wales winger made it 2-0 eight minutes later when Watford were caught out by a swift counterattack. Manor Solomon saw a shot deflected in for the third before half-time, with Joël Piroe slotting in the fourth midway through the second period after Watford were undone with some quick passing in tight spaces. Continue reading...
Highlights of the Sky Bet Championship match between Watford and Leeds United.

arts.ttl: Daniel Farke's 'not happy' verdict on Joel Piroe and what will happen next should worry rivals
arts.sum: Leeds United boss Daniel Farke has told Joel Piroe he wants 20 goals from him this season to help the club secure promotion to the Premier League. Farke is delighted with the return of his lead man up top, but wants at least six goals more in the final 14 matches, with the message to his player and the team to ensure the former Swansea City man stays at the top of his game.

arts.ttl: Sky Sports commentator left gushing over Leeds United after Watford win
arts.sum: Leeds United have cleared a gap to the sides behind them with an emphatic win away at Watford on Tuesday night, awaiting response from their rivals on Wednesday. After half time, Solomon then got his seventh assist as he picked out Piroe in a crowded area, seeing the Dutchman dance past a Watford defender before slotting into the corner.
How the game at Vicarage Road unfolded as Leeds cruised to a comprehensive victory.

arts.ttl: Five talking points as Watford crash to heavy Leeds loss
arts.sum: Five talking points as Championship leaders Leeds United inflict Watford's fifth consecutive defeat at Vicarage Road.

arts.ttl: Leeds United player ratings vs Watford as James and Piroe grab spotlight
arts.sum: Daniel James took advantage of a Edo Kayembe mistake to dispatch the first of the night before slamming home a second following a lovely move from Leeds on 28 minutes. His ball sparked the attack for the second goal, being productive all night.

arts.ttl: Dan James stars as Leeds thump Watford
arts.sum: Dan James scored twice as Leeds won 4-0 at Watford to move five points clear at the top of the Championship.
